title: Bloomberg Markets: Akamai CEO on Bots Versus Humans
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Akamai CEO on Bots Versus Humans
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Tom Leighton\u0010CEO\u0010Akamai Technologies \u0010Discussing third-quarter earnings and making a concentrated effort in its security business, including using machine learning to distingush between bots and humans in data breaches.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
